```{r}
library(here)
library(rio)
library(readxl)
```

```{r}
#read in all file names
filenames <- list.files("Project/AllRaceResults", pattern="*.xlsx", full.names=TRUE)

ldf <- lapply(filenames, read_excel)
res <- lapply(ldf, summary)
names(res) <- substr(filenames, 6,30)
````


```{r}
race_profile <- read.csv(here("Project", "RaceProfile.csv"))
UAEStage1 <- read.csv(here("Project", "UAEstage1.csv"))
UAEStage1$RaceName <- "UAEstage1"
total <- merge(race_profile, UAEStage1, by.x="RaceName")
```
